Title: Natural Selection
Writer: Graeme Manson (created by), John Fawcett (created by), Graeme Manson, Tony Elliott (story editor), Chris Roberts (story coordinator), Elize Morgan (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Peter Rowley (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Andrew De Angelis (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Kim Coghill (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Jeff Detsky (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Adam Higgs (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Alex Levine (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Rebecca Sernasie (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Bob Mackowycz Jr. (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident)
Actors: Tatiana Maslany, Dylan Bruce, Jordan Gavaris, Kevin Hanchard
Plot: Sarah Manning witnesses the death of a woman who looks exactly like her. She decides to escape her dramatic life and take the woman's identity for her own. But converting to a new life is harder than she expected.
